title: Favorite Designer?
content:
[http://www.appetiteengineers.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106211250/http:/www.appetiteengineers.com/ "http://www.appetiteengineers.com/")

I love this obsession with cats he has

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131106211250im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2302902324_29a61c0597_4218.jpg)
  
I did a project using the above poster as 'inspiration' last semester. While brainstorming, I got to look at a book with tons of his work in it and I really liked his versatility as a designer. I love this poster's lineatrity(is that a word?) and complexity.. And the cats of course
author: srquresh

comments.content:
i love that he uses his kitty too! just wait he'll be at loyola in  
april...yippee!
